Vintage Space Channel 5 Tee (Morolian)
kDesc
Dance with the rhythm to stop the invasion of Morolian, the peace of Earth is in your hand!
Danse en rythme pour stopper l'invasion Morolian, la paix sur Terre dépend de toi!
Tanze im Rhythmus und stoppe die Invasion der Morolianer. Die Zukunft der Erde liegt in deiner Hand!
Balla a tempo per fermare l'invasione dei Moroliani; la salvezza della Terra è nelle tue mani!
Sigue el ritmo para detener la invasión de los Morolians. ¡La paz en la Tierra depende de ti!
踊り団の魔の手から銀河を救え！
모로성인의 침략을 저지하고, 은하를 구해내라!
Dance with the rhythm to stop the invasion of Morolian, the peace of Earth is in your hand!
從舞團的魔手中搶救銀河！
從舞團的魔手中搶救銀河！
Dance with the rhythm to stop the invasion of Morolian, the peace of Earth is in your hand!
